meanings.definition: To provide (a room or building) with furniture again.
meanings.sent1: After the flood, they refurnished the entire house with new sofas and tables.
meanings.sent2: She refurnishes her bedroom every few years to keep it fresh and cozy.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to refurnish the living room with colorful and modern furniture, much to the delight of their guests.
meanings.sent4: The antique shop refurnishes old pieces of furniture, turning them into beautiful works of art.
meanings.sent5: Refurnishing the office with ergonomic chairs and desks improved productivity and morale.

meanings.definition: To make (furniture) look new again by repairing or repainting it.
meanings.sent1: He refurnishes old chairs by sanding and repainting them in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter refurnishes antique dressers to restore their original beauty.
meanings.sent3: She refurnishes her wooden desk, giving it a fresh coat of paint and a new lease on life.
meanings.sent4: The artist refurnishes a worn-out table, transforming it into a stunning piece of art.
meanings.sent5: Refurnishing the kitchen chairs with a glossy finish made them look brand new.
